segments.text: Could you tell me something about your previous job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I worked in a small machinery factory . My work was very simple and there was not much work to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I thought it was too dull . I'm capable of more responsibilities , so I decided to change my job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you choose our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yesterday I saw your company's advertisement . Your company is an important international company . Working for it , I believe it can improve my abilities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you know about our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , the company is the fourth largest machine producer in the world . It was founded in the United States in 1980 . I know that the company has made good use of advanced technology .
segments.speaker: S2
